languages.text: {n}Щелчок — Вигдис перехватывает вокс-канал у Равора.{/n} "Сообщение о пропаже пришло слишком поздно, вдобавок мы не решились открыть огонь по шаттлу без вашего прямого указания. Возможно, если бы вы оставили распоряжения на сей счет..." {n}Голос Вигдис звучит неуверенно.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Сообщение о пропаже пришло слишком поздно, вдобавок мы не решились открыть огонь по шаттлу без вашего прямого указания. Возможно, если бы вы оставили распоряжения на сей счет..." {n}Голос Вигдис звучит неуверенно.{/n}

languages.text: {n}There is an audible click as Vigdis takes over the vox-channel from Ravor.{/n} "The message about the incident came in too late, and we did not dare open fire on the shuttle without your direct instructions. Perhaps if you had left orders to that effect..." {n}Vigdis sounds uncertain.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Щелчок — Вигдис перехватывает вокс-канал у Равора.{/n} "Сообщение о пропаже пришло слишком поздно, вдобавок мы не решились открыть огонь по шаттлу без вашего прямого указания. Возможно, если бы вы оставили распоряжения на сей счет..." {n}Голос Вигдис звучит неуверенно.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "The message about the incident came in too late, and we didn't dare open fire on the shuttle without your direct instructions. Perhaps if you'd left orders to that effect..." {n}The voice of Vigdis sounds uncertain.{/n}

"The message about the incident came in too late, and we didn't dare open fire on the shuttle without your direct instructions. Perhaps if you'd left orders to that effect..." {n}The voice of Vigdis sounds uncertain.{/n}

{n}There is an audible click as Vigdis takes over the vox-channel from Ravor.{/n} "The message about the incident came in too late, and we did not dare open fire on the shuttle without your direct instructions. Perhaps if you had left orders to that effect..." {n}Vigdis sounds uncertain.{/n}

{n}There is an audible click as Vigdis takes over the vox-channel from Ravor.{/n} "The message about the incident came in too late, and we did not dare open fire on the shuttle without your direct instructions. Perhaps if you had left orders to that effect..." {n}Vigdis sounds uncertain.{/n}

languages.text: {n}维格迪斯从雷沃那里接管了音阵频道，音阵系统中传来了明显的咔哒声。{/n}“关于这次事件的消息传来得太晚了。如果没有您的直接命令，我们不敢朝那艘穿梭机开火。如果您提前下达了这个命令的话……”{n}维格迪斯的声音听起来很不确定。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is an audible click as Vigdis takes over the vox-channel from Ravor.{/n} "The message about the incident came in too late, and we did not dare open fire on the shuttle without your direct instructions. Perhaps if you had left orders to that effect..." {n}Vigdis sounds uncertain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}维格迪斯从雷沃那里接管了音阵频道，音阵系统中传来了明显的咔哒声。{/n}“关于这次事件的消息传来得太晚了。如果没有您的直接命令，我们不敢朝那艘穿梭机开火。如果您提前下达了这个命令的话……”{n}维格迪斯的声音听起来很不确定。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Con un sonoro chasquido, Vigdis toma el control del canal de voco de Ravor.{/n} «El mensaje sobre el incidente llegó demasiado tarde, y no nos atrevimos a abrir fuego contra la lanzadera sin su autorización. Tal vez si hubiera dejado órdenes para ese caso...». {n}Vigdis parece insegura.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is an audible click as Vigdis takes over the vox-channel from Ravor.{/n} "The message about the incident came in too late, and we did not dare open fire on the shuttle without your direct instructions. Perhaps if you had left orders to that effect..." {n}Vigdis sounds uncertain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Con un sonoro chasquido, Vigdis toma el control del canal de voco de Ravor.{/n} «El mensaje sobre el incidente llegó demasiado tarde, y no nos atrevimos a abrir fuego contra la lanzadera sin su autorización. Tal vez si hubiera dejado órdenes para ese caso...». {n}Vigdis parece insegura.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Es ertönt ein hörbares Klicken, als Vigdis den Vox-Kanal von Ravor übernimmt.{/n} "Die Nachricht über den Vorfall kam zu spät, und wir haben es nicht gewagt, ohne Eure direkten Anweisungen das Feuer auf das Shuttle zu eröffnen. Wenn Ihr einen entsprechenden Befehl hinterlassen hättet ..." {n}Vigdis klingt unsicher.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is an audible click as Vigdis takes over the vox-channel from Ravor.{/n} "The message about the incident came in too late, and we did not dare open fire on the shuttle without your direct instructions. Perhaps if you had left orders to that effect..." {n}Vigdis sounds uncertain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}There is an audible click as Vigdis takes over the vox-channel from Ravor.{/n} "The message about the incident came in too late, and we did not dare open fire on the shuttle without your direct instructions. Perhaps if you had left orders to that effect..." {n}Vigdis sounds uncertain.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vigdis prend le relais de Ravor sur le canal-vox avec un clic audible.{/n} « Le message au sujet de l'incident est arrivé trop tard, nous n'avons pas osé ouvrir le feu sur la navette sans un ordre direct de votre part. Peut-être que si vous aviez laissé des instructions dans ce sens... » {n}La voix de Vigdis est empreinte d'incertitude.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is an audible click as Vigdis takes over the vox-channel from Ravor.{/n} "The message about the incident came in too late, and we did not dare open fire on the shuttle without your direct instructions. Perhaps if you had left orders to that effect..." {n}Vigdis sounds uncertain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis prend le relais de Ravnor sur le canal-vox avec un clic audible.{/n} « Le message au sujet de l'incident est arrivé trop tard, nous n'avons pas osé ouvrir le feu sur la navette sans un ordre direct de votre part. Peut-être que si vous aviez laissé des instructions dans ce sens... » {n}La voix de Vigdis est empreinte d'incertitude.{/n}

languages.text: {n}カチリと音がして、ヴィグディスがラヴォアからヴォクス通信を引き継いだ。{/n}「今回の件に関する連絡が遅く届いたので、陛下から直接指示もなくシャトルを攻撃するほど踏み込めませんでした。陛下からその旨の命令があれば、あるいは…」{n}ヴィグディスは自信がなさそうに答える。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is an audible click as Vigdis takes over the vox-channel from Ravor.{/n} "The message about the incident came in too late, and we did not dare open fire on the shuttle without your direct instructions. Perhaps if you had left orders to that effect..." {n}Vigdis sounds uncertain.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}カチリと音がして、ヴィグディスがラヴォアからヴォクス通信を引き継いだ。{/n}「今回の件に関する連絡が遅く届いたので、陛下から直接指示もなくシャトルを攻撃するほど踏み込めませんでした。陛下からその旨の命令があれば、あるいは…」{n}ヴィグディスは自信がなさそうに答える。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ravor'un yerine Vigdis'in kanala girişiyle vokstan bir tık sesi geliyor.{/n} "Hadiseyle ilgili rapor elimize çok geç ulaştı. Sizin emrinizi duymadan mekiğe ateş açmaya da cüret etmedik. Belki o yönde bir emir vermiş olsaydınız..." {n}Vigdis'in tereddüdü sesinden anlaşılıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}There is an audible click as Vigdis takes over the vox-channel from Ravor.{/n} "The message about the incident came in too late, and we did not dare open fire on the shuttle without your direct instructions. Perhaps if you had left orders to that effect..." {n}Vigdis sounds uncertain.{/n}
